title: ISic020599. ISic020599
body:
1ϝια<ν>θὶς καλὰ Μιτάλο̄νι δοκ̣[ῖ] ἐ͂μεν

1ϜΙΑΘΙΣΚΑΛΑΜΙΤΑΛΟ̄ΝΙΔΟ.[.]ΕΜΕΝ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena (IGASM 5)

English translation

Violet flower, to Mitalon, she looks beautiful.

Italian translation

Valentina Mignosa

Fiore di violetta, per Mitalon, lei sembra bella.

commentary
